food.question: I am yellow and curved. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🟡 I grow on trees.
🍌 My peel is easy to take off.
😋 I am a good source of potassium.

food.question: I am round and red or green. I'm often eaten in pies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees.
🍎 Snow White had a problem with me.
🥧 I am a popular flavor for pies and juice.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. I am often poured on cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am a liquid.
🐄 Cows produce me.
🦴 I help make your bones strong.

food.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🐇 Bugs Bunny enjoys me.
👁️ I am good for your eyesight.

food.question: I am a grain that is often eaten for breakfast. I can be puffed or flaked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 I am served in a bowl, often with milk.
🌾 I come from a field.
☀️ I am a popular morning food.

food.question: I am made of dough and baked in an oven. I can be sliced and eaten with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am a type of carbohydrate.
🥪 You can make a sandwich with me.
🧈 I am often eaten with butter, jam, or as toast.

food.question: I am a popular party snack. I am made of corn and come in many flavors. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am often eaten at the movies.
🌽 I pop when heated.
🧂 Salt and butter are a common addition.

food.question: I am a dessert that is cold and sweet. I come in many flavors, often served in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I melt in the sun.
🍧 I'm made from cream, sugar, and flavors.
🍨 You can put sprinkles, nuts, or sauces on me.

food.question: I am a type of food that is made from ground wheat or other grains and usually cooked in boiling water. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 I am often eaten with sauce.
🍜 I am a popular part of Italian cuisine, but also Asian.
🍴 You can eat me with a fork or chopsticks.

food.question: I am a type of dish with meat, vegetables, and broth, cooked slowly in a pot. What am I?

hints.text: 🍲 I keep you warm on a cold day.
🥄 You eat me with a spoon.
🔥 I often take a long time to cook to bring out the flavors.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and cold. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am frozen water.
🧤 You can make snowballs with me.
☃️ You can build a snowman from me.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I give you vitamin D.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I make the trees dance, and I can fly a kite. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I am moving air.
🌬️ You can feel me on your face.
🪁 I can be gentle or strong.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. You need an umbrella when I come. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am liquid water.
☔ I can fill puddles.
🌈 Sometimes I make rainbows.

weather.question: I am a big white puffy thing in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am made of water droplets.
🐑 I can look like animals.
⛈️ I can block the sun.

weather.question: I am a storm with strong winds that spin around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I have an eye in the middle.
🏠 I can cause a lot of damage.
🌊 I form over warm ocean water.

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky. I can be small or large and bumpy. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can hurt if I hit you.
🏌️ I can damage cars.
💧 I am ice, but I formed in the sky instead of a freezer.

weather.question: I am a type of precipitation that is a mix of rain and snow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I am wet and cold.
❄️ I am not quite rain and not quite snow.
🥶 I can make it slippery outside.

weather.question: I am a long period of very little rain. Everything gets dry and plants can die. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ I can cause wildfires.
🌵 Water is scarce during me.
🌾 Farmers worry about me.

weather.question: I am a sudden spark of electricity in the sky, often followed by a loud crash. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am very bright.
🌩️ I come from storm clouds.
🔊 I make a booming sound afterwards.
